body:
In ntr, if you have a big dick, you can conquer all and every woman. Honestly, ntr has become as lame and basic as vanilla; just a copy-paste story that has no originality beyond "muh cheating whore of a partner", painting every girl as a slut. Missed the days where ntr did psychological pain. Now it's a void of what it used to be.
Waste of art, tbh
